statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND block_number < 1000;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND amount = 50.00;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE block_number >= 5000 AND transaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM flagged_addresses WHERE address = '1HvLe7j5P2jn6J7q3JKb2b1fCmZf2r1NAQ' AND flagged_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_accounts WHERE account_id = 123 AND suspicious_level > 5;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
